scripts.start: start cmd.exe @cmd /k "cd backend && yarn start" && start cmd.exe @cmd /k "cd frontend && yarn start"
scripts.build: start cmd.exe @cmd /k "cd backend && yarn build" && start cmd.exe @cmd /k "cd frontend && yarn build"
scripts.install: start cmd.exe @cmd /k "cd backend && yarn && exit" && start cmd.exe @cmd /k "cd frontend && yarn && exit"
